qoute: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
Love is a conflict between reflexes and reflections.
It is through cooperation, rather than conflict, that your greatest successes will be derived…
Civilisation has ever accompanied emigration and conquest - the conflict of opinion, of religion, or of race.
Comedy comes from conflict, from hatred.
Communism is in conflict with human nature.
Conflict cannot survive without your participation.
Conflict grows out of ignorance and suspicion.
Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
Love is a conflict between reflexes and reflections.
It is through cooperation, rather than conflict, that your greatest successes will be derived…
Civilisation has ever accompanied emigration and conquest - the conflict of opinion, of religion, or of race.
Comedy comes from conflict, from hatred.
Communism is in conflict with human nature.
Conflict cannot survive without your participation.
Conflict grows out of ignorance and suspicion.
Experience means conflict, our natures being what they are, and conflict means drama.
I am in politics because of the conflict between good and evil, and I believe that in the end good will triumph.
Laws are felt only when the individual comes into conflict with them.
Never in the field of human conflict was so much owed by so many to so few.
Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with conflict by peaceful means.
Republicans are for both the man and the dollar, but in case of conflict the man before the dollar.
Strength alone knows conflict, weakness is born vanquished.
The final conflict will be between the Communists and the ex-Communists.
The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
The hottest place in Hell is reserved for those who remain neutral in times of great moral conflict.
There is no conflict between liberty and safety. We will have both or neither.
To the truly humble man the ordinary ways and customs and habits of men are not a matter of conflict.
Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall.
Why don't you want to do what you know you should do? The reason you don't is that you're in conflict with yourself.
